name: Charizard
evolution: Level 1 Charmander, Level 5 Charmeleon, Level 9 Charizard

passive.name: Blaze
passive.description: When the Pokemon is at half HP or less, its critical-hit rate is increased.

basic attack.description: Deal damage to targets in a cone over a period of time. Distance increased with this attack as Charizard levels up. This attack deals more damage against burning Pok√©mon.

base.name: Flame Burst
base.description: Attacks with a bursting flame, leaving opposing Pokemon burned.

upgrades.name: Flamethrower
upgrades.description: Attacks with an intense blast of fire, leaving opposing Pokemon burned.

upgrade.description: Basic attacks reduce Fire Punch cooldown.

upgrades.name: Fire Punch
upgrades.description: Launches foward using a fist of flames to attack. Deals additional damage to burned opponents.

base.name: Fire Spin
base.description: Encircles opposing Pokemon in the area of effect with a vortex of fire, also decreasing their movement speed for a short time.

upgrades.name: Fire Blast
upgrades.description: Attacks with an intense blase of all-consuming fire. While the flames continue to burn on the ground, opposing Pokemon in the area of effect receive damage over time. This also decreases the movement speed of opposing Pokemon for a short time.

upgrade.description: Decrease movement speed of opposing Pokemon for a short time when hit by this move.

upgrades.name: Flare Blitz
upgrades.description: Charges forward cloaked in fire, throwing opposing Pokemon. This also grants the user a shield.

unite.name: Seismic Slam
unite.description: Charizard flies in the air and attacks opponents from there, gets invulnerability, and then does a seismic toss to target.
